VOIP or Voice above Online Protocol is a method utilised to transmit voice communications above the Web. Also termed as Internet telephony, this technology has truly changed the strategy of telecommunication. The analog voice sign that emerges from your phone is converted to electronic IP packets and is ship via the IP network. On the destination facet, the packets are converted again to analog kind. Each open up and proprietary protocols are utilised for the implementation of VOIP facility. A few amongst them involves Real Time Transport protocol (RTP), Media Gateway Handle Protocol (MGCP), and Session Description Protocol (SDP).

VOIP equipment are becoming ever more common these days, as it gives a vast range of positive aspects to its users.
